description: Giant hyssop (Agastache 'Black Adder') is an amazing plant species for gardening and plant enthusiasts alike. Its spires of tubular, nectar-rich flowers will draw in all kinds of pollinators, bringing life and color to any garden or outdoor space. Growing up to 8 feet in height, it has striking, dark purple foliage and brightly hued magenta-pink flowers that bloom from mid-summer through early fall. Beyond its beauty, this versatile plant is incredibly low maintenance and deer resistant, thriving in sunny spots and well-drained soils. It's perfect for borders, cut flower and even dried flower arrangements.
